trans-unit.source: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.
trans-unit.target: 決定非 MSBuild 專案參考的輸出檔。

trans-unit.source: The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs.
trans-unit.target: `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput`工作所設定的特殊屬性搜尋[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]IDE 專案 Guid 和其相關聯的輸出的清單。

trans-unit.source: The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references.
trans-unit.target: IDE 只預先解析非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案，並以這種方式分隔[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考從非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]參考。

trans-unit.source: The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences.
trans-unit.target: IDE 會傳回的清單[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]UnresolvedProjectReferences 專案。

trans-unit.source: This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓工作更強大使用[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]機制來操作只[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考，例如。

trans-unit.source: calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以取得資訊清單檔案名稱參考的特定目標，這就不可能的混合清單[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]和非-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作執行成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 字串，其中包含已解析的專案輸出。

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: XML 字串，其中包含已解析的專案輸出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已解析的參考路徑，這個已解析的參考路徑保留原始專案參考屬性。

trans-unit.source: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: 保留原始專案參考屬性的已解析參考路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定採用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的專案參考項目。

trans-unit.source: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: 採用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的專案參考項目。

trans-unit.source: Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: 因為[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]前解析非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案中，無法透過預先解析的輸出清單來解析專案參考項目位於[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]格式。
